exam_name: Lower Division Clerk (LDC) / Upper Division Clerk (UDC) / Assistant Recruitment
organization: Various Central Ministries and Departments via SSC
eligibility: 12th pass for LDC, Graduate degree for UDC/Assistant from recognized boards/universities.
selection_process: Tier-I and Tier-II CBT, Skill / Typing Test, Document Verification.
description: Recruitment for clerical and administrative positions in central government ministries through SSC CHSL and CGL exams. These roles involve file work, office management, and administrative support.
salary_range: ₹25,500 – ₹92,300 per month (depending on level and post).

organization: Ministry of Home Affairs and related agencies
eligibility: Graduation in any discipline; specialized posts may require law, economics, or forensic degrees.
selection_process: Written Examination, Interview, and Security Clearance.
description: Administrative and clerical staff are recruited for roles in investigative and intelligence agencies such as IB, CBI, NIA, and ED to handle documentation, data management, and analysis support.
application_cycle: Vacancies announced periodically on MHA or SSC sites.

organization: Kendriya Vidyalaya Sangathan / Navodaya Vidyalaya Samiti
eligibility: Graduate or Postgraduate in relevant fields; Computer proficiency required.
description: Recruitment for administrative and clerical roles in central government-run educational institutions under KVS and NVS, ensuring institutional operations and record maintenance.

exam_name: CSIR / ICAR / DRDO Administrative Staff Recruitment
organization: CSIR, ICAR, DRDO, DST under Government of India
eligibility: Graduation or Postgraduate degree; Typing and computer skills mandatory.
description: Research and scientific institutions hire administrative support staff to manage logistics, HR, and documentation related to R&D and project operations.
salary_range: ₹35,000 – ₹80,000 per month (depending on level and organization).

exam_name: Income Tax / Customs / GST Inspector Recruitment
organization: Central Board of Direct Taxes (CBDT) / Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs (CBIC)
eligibility: Graduate degree in any discipline from a recognized university.
selection_process: Tier-I and Tier-II (SSC CGL), Document Verification, Medical Test.
description: Central tax and customs departments recruit inspectors and clerical officers to manage taxation, investigation, and compliance-related administrative duties.

organization: India Post (Department of Posts, Govt. of India)
eligibility: 10+2 pass with computer knowledge (for Postal Assistant); 10th pass for GDS.
description: India Post recruits postal and clerical staff for mail processing, delivery, and administrative management under central postal networks.
